title: segv during sync on recursive logical link
body:
consistent repeating segv during sync.

bug1: ecursive 'ln -s . link' cause loop with iterative  'stat ./link/link/....'

owncloud :  1.1+git20110209-0ubuntu1
ubuntu 11.04

bug2 segv after recursive link is removed : strace last 20 lines

tail -20 /tmp/owncloud-oak.log
poll([{fd=3, events=pollin}, {fd=12, events=pollin|pollpri}, {fd=14, events=pollin|pollpri}, {fd=15, events=pollin|pollp i}, {fd=16, events=pollin|pollpri}, {fd=17, events=pollin}, {fd=19, events=pollin}, {fd=20, events=pollin}, {fd=21, even s=pollin}, {fd=7, events=pollin}, {fd=26, events=pollin}, {fd=27, events=pollin}, {fd=28, events=pollin}, {fd=32, events pollin}, {fd=36, events=pollin}, {fd=42, events=pollin}, {fd=46, events=pollin}], 17, 0) = 1 ([{fd=3, revents=pollin}])
read(3, "a", 1)                         = 1
clock_gettime(clock_monotonic, {1970997, 601408114}) = 0
read(7, 0x96e62e8, 4096)                = -1 eagain (resource temporarily unavailable)
futex(0xaf700010, futex_wait_private, 2, null) = -1 eagain (resource temporarily unavailable)
futex(0xaf700010, futex_wake_private, 1) = 0
clock_gettime(clock_monotonic, {1970997, 601828705}) = 0
read(7, 0x96e62e8, 4096)                = -1 eagain (resource temporarily unavailable)
read(17, 0x97531b0, 4096)               = -1 eagain (resource temporarily unavailable)
poll([{fd=3, events=pollin}, {fd=12, events=pollin|pollpri}, {fd=14, events=pollin|pollpri}, {fd=15, events=pollin|pollpri}, {fd=16, events=pollin|pollpri}, {fd=17, events=pollin}, {fd=19, events=pollin}, {fd=20, events=pollin}, {fd=21, events=pollin}, {fd=7, events=pollin}, {fd=26, events=pollin}, {fd=27, events=pollin}, {fd=28, events=pollin}, {fd=32, events=pollin}, {fd=36, events=pollin}, {fd=42, events=pollin}, {fd=46, events=pollin}], 17, 0) = 1 ([{fd=3, revents=pollin}])
read(3, "a", 1)                         = 1
clock_gettime(clock_monotonic, {1970997, 602634266}) = 0
read(7, 0x96e62e8, 4096)                = -1 eagain (resource temporarily unavailable)
clock_gettime(clock_monotonic, {1970997, 602865654}) = 0
read(7, 0x96e62e8, 4096)                = -1 eagain (resource temporarily unavailable)
read(17, 0x97531b0, 4096)               = -1 eagain (resource temporarily unavailable)
poll([{fd=3, events=pollin}, {fd=12, events=pollin|pollpri}, {fd=14, events=pollin|pollpri}, {fd=15, events=pollin|pollpri}, {fd=16, events=pollin|pollpri}, {fd=17, events=pollin}, {fd=19, events=pollin}, {fd=20, events=pollin}, {fd=21, events=pollin}, {fd=7, events=pollin}, {fd=26, events=pollin}, {fd=27, events=pollin}, {fd=28, events=pollin}, {fd=32, events=pollin}, {fd=36, events=pollin}, {fd=42, events=pollin}, {fd=46, events=pollin}], 17, 9096) = 1 ([{fd=3, revents=pollin}])
read(3, "a", 1)                         = 1
futex(0x96b407c, futex_wake_private, 1 <unfinished ...>
+++ killed by sigsegv +++
